name: The Blue Notes Piano Tutorials
profile:
Welcome to The Blue Notes Piano Tutorials YouTube channel. Your one-stop high-quality YouTube channel for piano covers, tutorials & lessons. We'll be uploading piano covers from TV theme tunes, film soundtracks, famous songs plus lots more. Please subscribe! All songs are recorded and performed by London based band - The Blue Notes.

All tracks that feature on this channel are also available to stream/ download from all digital music platforms
Spotify: https://tinyurl.com/n67y3vr7
iTunes/Apple Music: https://tinyurl.com/jpkwshke
Amazon: https://tinyurl.com/h2azp22b

Videos made with Synthesia - www.synthesiagame.com

Download all sheet music here: https://musescore.com/user/16006641
Please leave requests on our videos!
